title: The Ascension Protocol
description: The first installment of this metaphysical thriller series takes us on a wild ride through this life and the next when a secret military consciousness research program, led by a world renowned neuroscientist, discovers that the mind survives the death of the body and continues on in a non-physical dimension where your thoughts and emotions create your experience. Join Dr. Sydney Monroe on a journey that reveals... Life, as we know it, is only half the story.
author: Jefferson Lovely
